content: this crochet scarf hooks up super quick and the pattern design is perfect for the long color changes of caron cakes yarn i used regular cakes just a bit over one cake my winter scarf weighs 9 7 oz so i think it would work out great with using just one caron big cake ball of yarn of course you can use your preferred worsted weight yarn there are so many color options you can choose for this scarf think about school colors and favorite sports teams when planning your colors
